name: MHRD
description: MHRD is a hardware design game, in which you design various hardware circuits in a hardware description language. The hardware circuits you design get more complex as you go until you create a fully functional CPU design.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: x86 (64-bit) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
